description: Unofficial launcher for JGSoft regex software
command.resetAllSettings: JGS Regex Launcher: Reset All Settings
config.title: JGS Regex Launcher
config.onboarding.showOnStartup: Show the setup prompt on startup (profile-specific)
config.regexBuddy.path: Full path to RegexBuddy executable (defaults to C:\Program Files\Just Great Software\RegexBuddy 4\RegexBuddy4.exe).
config.regexBuddy.args: Arguments template array for RegexBuddy. You can use placeholders: {regex}, {file}, {dir}, {line}, {selection}. Each item is one argument entry.
config.regexBuddy.preArgs: Arguments inserted before other args for RegexBuddy. Defaults to `-getfromclipboard` and `-putonclipboard`.
config.regexBuddy.sample.args: Arguments template array for RegexBuddy Sample mode. Placeholders supported: {regex}, {file}, {dir}, {line}, {selection}.
config.regexBuddy.sample.preArgs: Arguments inserted before other args for RegexBuddy Sample mode. Defaults to `-testclipboard` and `-putonclipboard`.
config.regexMagic.path: Full path to RegexMagic executable (defaults to C:\Program Files\Just Great Software\RegexMagic 2\RegexMagic2.exe).
config.regexMagic.args: Arguments template array for RegexMagic. You can use placeholders: {regex}, {file}, {dir}, {line}, {selection}. Each item is one argument entry.
config.regexMagic.preArgs: Arguments inserted before other args for RegexMagic. Defaults to `-sampleclipboard` and `-putonclipboard`.
